errors.error_description: Python version compatibility error - River requires Python 3.8+ but README states Python 2.7+
correction_candidates: River is intended to work with **Python 3.8 and above**.
River is intended to work with **Python 3.6 and above**.
River is intended to work with **Python 3.7 and above**.
errors.golden_answer: River is intended to work with **Python 3.8 and above**.

errors.error_description: Unnecessary dependency installation - added specific numpy and scipy versions that are not required
